# yh-plugin-project

The yh-plugin-project is used to develop plugins.

================================================================================

### Installation
Init the development environment.
Requires [Node.js](https://nodejs.org/) v6+ to run.

```sh
$ npm install
```
### Build plugin file
BUild the plugin file for development or production.
```sh
$ npm plugin-build
$ npm plugin-build-p
```
